participant_1.background:
I enjoyed a nice walk outside to appreciate the weather.
i love cooking.
I am married to another viking descendant and we have many children.
I enjoy wearing my cat-eye glasses while training to compete in the Olympics.
i visit comic con.

participant_2.background:
I remember my dad teaching me how to play basketball in our driveway.
I would like to have a job where I can use my creativity and technical skills.
i have a garden in my yard.
i make friends fast and say goodbye fast.
I'm not sure if I'm a healthy person, but I'm trying my best to live a healthy lifestyle.

content.text: It's going well! I just got home from working out. How about yours?
It was good! I went for a walk and enjoyed the weather.
That sounds nice! I wish I could go for a walk every day.
You should! It's really good for you.
I know, I know. I'm trying to make it a habit.
That's great! What kind of work do you do?
I'm a software engineer. I work on a team that creates software for medical devices.
That sounds really interesting! I'm a chef.
Oh, cool! I love to cook. Do you have a restaurant?
No, I work in a restaurant. I love cooking, but I don't think I'd like to own a restaurant.
Yeah, it's a lot of work. What kind of food do you cook?
I cook a variety of food, but my specialty is Italian food.
Oh, that sounds delicious! I love Italian food.
Me too! It's my favorite kind of food
